name: fenrus
description: Fenrus is a personal start page and self-hosted dashboard that lets users pin links, widgets, and search to a customizable home screen. Itâ€™s designed for homelabs and personal servers as a central access hub.
features: Dashboard: Personal start page, Customizable widgets, Link management. Central access hub for your homelab.
Search Integration: Built-in search functionality. Quick access to everything.
Widget Support: Display service status and info. Live monitoring.
Homelab-Focused: Designed for self-hosted environments. Perfect for server management.
Service Integration: Connect to Docker, APIs. Real-time status.
Custom Themes: Personalize appearance. Your style.
Bookmarks: Organize favorite links. Quick navigation.
Responsive: Works on desktop and mobile. Access anywhere.
